subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Stefano Garzelli won the 16th stage of the Giro d’Italia, a mountain time trial, ahead of the world champion Cadel Evans. David Arroyo Duran held onto the overall lead.
snippet: Stefano Garzelli won the 16th stage of the Giro d’Italia, a mountain time trial, ahead of the world champion Cadel Evans. David Arroyo Duran held onto the overall lead.
